records.nam: Dongxuanguan beds, Fangshan, Jiangning county, Nanjing
records.ref: M. M. Chow and C.-K. Hu. 1956. The occurence of Anchitherium aurelianense at Fangshan, Nanking. Acta Palaeontologica Sinica (=Gushengwu xuebao) 4(4):525-533
records.ldc: Bed No 8 is a brown, yellow, gray sandlayer, 3 m. Below that layer is a layer of fine pebbles, above there is a grayish, sandy clay with white calcareous strings.
